entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23.
